trans-unit.source: Set up Android management | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Set up Android management | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Enable mobile device management (MDM) for Android and KNOX devices with Microsoft Intune.
trans-unit.target: Enable mobile device management (MDM) for Android and KNOX devices with Microsoft Intune.

trans-unit.source: As an Intune administrator, you can enable manage Android devices from the Company Portal.
trans-unit.target: As an Intune administrator, you can enable manage Android devices from the Company Portal.

trans-unit.source: Users can then enroll their devices using the Company Portal app available from Google Play.
trans-unit.target: Users can then enroll their devices using the Company Portal app available from Google Play.

trans-unit.source: If you haven’t already, prepare for mobile device management by [setting the mobile device management authority](get-ready-to-enroll-devices-in-microsoft-intune.md#set-mobile-device-management-authority) as **Microsoft Intune** and setting up MDM.
trans-unit.target: If you haven’t already, prepare for mobile device management by [setting the mobile device management authority](get-ready-to-enroll-devices-in-microsoft-intune.md#set-mobile-device-management-authority) as **Microsoft Intune** and setting up MDM.

trans-unit.source: No additional configurations in the Intune console are needed to enable Android mobile device enrollment.
trans-unit.target: No additional configurations in the Intune console are needed to enable Android mobile device enrollment.

trans-unit.source: Tell users how to get access to company resources with the company portal
trans-unit.target: Tell users how to get access to company resources with the company portal

trans-unit.source: Your users will need to know how to enroll their devices and what to expect once they're brought into management.
trans-unit.target: Your users will need to know how to enroll their devices and what to expect once they're brought into management.

trans-unit.target: What to tell your end users about using Microsoft Intune
